replies.body: Crash Round 2
Hopefully, it will just be "Clash Round 3", seeing as in OCE we've had 1 "Crash" and 2 previously successful "Clash" tests.
I've witnessed every clash test, 2 was the only successful one thank lord :blessrng:
Just checking what time it actually starts. In-client it says lock in opens at 9:00pm NZT (7:00pm AEST) for a tier 4 team, but according to this post thatâ€™s when it should close right?.
I'm just glad clash is back. I can round the boys to play some in-game client tournament. Nice work!

this i great to hear. have had lots of problems in champ select and i really hope to see alot of improvment in these small things to make the game run smoothly. as league has always been a really well made game its good to see this

Hi everyone, I incorrectly stated on this article that Lock ins close for all tiers at 7PM AEST.

In fact, lock ins open at 7PM for Tier 4, 7:30PM for Tier 3, 8:00PM for Tier 2, and 8:30PM for Tier 1. All tier lockins close at 9PM AEST.

Apologies for the confusion, changes have been made to reflect the correct info, should show up soon.
This is a pretty massive and annoying mistake. We've made plans around the information in this article, that clash started at 5. Very disappointing.

At this point can we just delete the OCE server. The Riot employees here give little to no effort all the time, and the playerbase is tiny anyway. Just merge us with the Garena region servers as soon as Riot gets control of them again please.
ðŸ‘Ž
Anyone know if flex placements work or does it have to be solo q?

I believe the Clash FAQ covers this and other questions you might want answered: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360000951548-Clash-FAQ

To join or create a Clash team, you need to have:

- Reached level 30
- Completed placements in at least one Summoner's Rift ranked queue
- Be at least Honor level 2
- Verified your League account by SMS (this is a new Clash-specific feature)
oi when is the next clash, is this information that is not known? they should make it a weekly beta until it is actual clash because it is enjoyable.
Clash tiers are messed up i was in a tier 4 tournament and was versing gold, plat and diamonds. {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
ok so wat window do we hv to lock in
cos i told everyone it was 7 AWST time but apparently its 5
If I am tier 4 what is the latest time my team can lock-in?

A tier IV team can lock in anytime between 5:00 and 7:00 PM AEST.
As soon as it's locked in, it will be placed in a bracket. When the bracket fills up (8 teams), the tournament will begin.
This is not true, apparently Riot OCE can't tell the difference between "opens" and "closes". At this stage you can lock in between 7 and 9pm AEST.
ahhhh

Obviously it's too late for this week, but could you consider NZ players next time? The listed times on here would have been great, but now with the confirmed later start times, Tier 1 players don't start until 10:30 which is way too late to play 3 games for a lot of people. Even tier 3 at 9:30 is really pushing it

Is triumphant Ryze skin one of the prizes for winning the clash tournament? As well, what are the other rewards expected given the amount of players playing? Will these be scaled for the lower pop servers?

Triumphant Ryze can only be earned from community tournaments [like these](https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/community-events/community-events-august) (Sep post coming this week hopefully)

For Clash, rewards are not scaled up or down depending on the amount of players playing, because everyone plays in the same format (8 team brackets both days) so population has no impact.
huh but im working sat :(
You can still play in the same event on Sunday! You don't need to play on Saturday first.

If this is going to be like NA's Clash where it causes all LoL games to jump 50 ping then expect people to be upset. I don't know how this has taken more than 2 years to organise and still not be perfected

the reason for the crash was that there was too many games happening at once and the server basically overloaded. They changed the way clash works this time. teams will be able to log in within a much larger window and games will begin immediately. This means that instead of being put in a bracket before the tournament starts, the system will automatically sort teams into brackets when they log in and place them with other teams that are ready. This way matches can start immediately instead of all being centered around one scheduled time.
{{champion:34}}
